mapper.insert: INSERT IGNORE INTO sys_role_menu(role_id, menu_id) VALUES (#{roleId}, #{menuId})
mapper.select:
SELECT menu.* FROM sys_menu AS menu
INNER JOIN sys_role_menu AS rm ON rm.menu_id = menu.id
AND rm.role_id = #{roleId}
AND LOCATE(#{condition.name}, menu.name) > 0
ORDER BY menu.created_at ASC
